## UnmappedOffer interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface UnmappedOffer
```

## Properties

| Property                                                           | Modifiers | Type         | Description                                              |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ------------ | -------------------------------------------------------- |
| [currency](./sdk.unmappedoffer.currency.md)                        |           | string       | The currency contract address of the offer token.        |
| [expirationTimestamp?](./sdk.unmappedoffer.expirationtimestamp.md) |           | BigNumberish | <i>(Optional)</i> The time where the offer expires       |
| [listingId?](./sdk.unmappedoffer.listingid.md)                     |           | BigNumberish | <i>(Optional)</i> The listing that the offer was made on |
| [offeror](./sdk.unmappedoffer.offeror.md)                          |           | string       | The user who is making the offer.                        |
| [pricePerToken](./sdk.unmappedoffer.pricepertoken.md)              |           | BigNumberish | The amount of coins offered per token.                   |
| [quantityDesired?](./sdk.unmappedoffer.quantitydesired.md)         |           | BigNumberish | <i>(Optional)</i> The quantity of tokens to be bought.   |
| [quantityWanted](./sdk.unmappedoffer.quantitywanted.md)            |           | BigNumberish | The amount of tokens desired.                            |
